definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: What's more, these compasses would be small and would consume very little energy.
sentences.chinese: 另外，这些新型罗盘将小巧玲珑并且能耗极低。

sentences.english: One-circle calibration method is adopted to realize auto-calibration.
sentences.chinese: 采用一周标定法实现电子罗盘的自动校准。

sentences.english: Living after an aim is like captaining after a ambit.
sentences.chinese: 生活不目标就像航海没有罗盘。
也可以用双筒望远镜和罗盘。

sentences.english: The compass leads people to the place where the dreams at.
sentences.chinese: 罗盘给人们指引寻梦的路。

sentences.english: South is opposite north on a compass.
sentences.chinese: 罗盘上南与北是相对的。

sentences.english: The face of the compass generally highlights the cardinal points of north, south, east and west.
sentences.chinese: 罗盘表面一般集合东南西北基本方位。

sentences.english: In Southern Song Dynasty, Land Compass was invented. It is composed of a magnet needle mounted on an azimuth plate.
sentences.chinese: 南宋时发明了将磁针装在方位盘上的旱罗盘。

sentences.english: It is principle in judicatory as if compass it in voyage.
sentences.chinese: 理念之于司法，犹如罗盘之于航海。

sentences.english: Additional tools which will be required are metre stick plumb line and compass.
sentences.chinese: 其他必须的工具包括米尺，铅垂和罗盘。

sentences.english: Now, use your compasses to measure the attitude of the two limbs of the anticline.
sentences.chinese: 现在用你们的罗盘去测量一下那个背斜两翼的产状。

sentences.english: Living without an aim is like sailing without a compass.
sentences.chinese: 氕羭生活没有目标，犹如航海没有罗盘。

sentences.english: This was supplanted in the early 20th century by the liquid-filled magnetic compass.
sentences.chinese: 直到20世纪早期才被流体填充磁性罗盘取代。

sentences.english: This is where the compass icon comes into play.
sentences.chinese: 这时就需要罗盘图标发挥作用了。

sentences.english: Jack's compass? What does Beckett want with that?
sentences.chinese: 杰克的罗盘，贝克特要它干嘛？

sentences.english: More often than not, like needles of a compass, heads swiveled northward.
sentences.chinese: 通常，它们会像罗盘的指针一样，把脑袋转向北面。

definition: four divisions (of the twenty-eight constellations 二十八宿[er4 shi2 ba1 xiu4] of the sky into groups of seven mansions), namely: Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙[Qing1 long2], White Tiger 白虎[Bai2 hu3], Vermilion Bird 朱雀[Zhu1 que4], Black Tortoise 玄武[Xuan2 wu3]
(Taoism) talisman in the form of a painting of symbols thought to have magical powers
five phases of Chinese philosophy: wood 木, fire 火, earth 土, metal 金, water 水
abstruse/profound mystery/the mysteries of the universe
geographical position according to the principles of feng shui 風水|风水[feng1 shui3]/ley lines
